title: Project Left-overs
body:
What happens to any project cache items we may still have in our inventory? Now that it's over, will something happen to it, since we can't really get the icons or more cores.

Can we disechant it maybe? or get ip for it?

What's the deal?

replies.body: Maybe there'll be another project event in the near-mid future? http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/510/498/873.jpg
I heard people saying that you'll be able to disenchant it, but i'm not sure
you only get 2 essence for each thing..really not anything
Aw, it wont thumbnail. That's my expression when I hear people not appreciate free stuff lol...unless it's negative free stuff, like a chimpanzee throwing poop at crowds of people. xD
you can disenchant it for a little essence according to riot though i'm keeping just in case of future events
I might disenchant some, since I just want Project Lucian or Ashe, but when does the ability to disenchant become available?

> [{quoted}](name=Kronin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IxMAZRro,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-08-17T10:51:40.991+0000)
>
> I might disenchant some, since I just want Project Lucian or Ashe, but when does the ability to disenchant become available?

its literally 2 essence per project core or blueprint

I have a distinct feeling the amount of essence you will get will be negligible. What I'm curious about is what happens to the project skin blueprints. Also I saw someone with a project leona first strike border. How did they get that?

By buying the skin when it was released

Source: I own first strike lucian

Yeah, I got the border for zed since I got it the week it was released.
And everyone got project Yasuo borders, whoever owned the skin, since they never gave a border in the first place.
All project leftovers will be fed to Cho'Gath. He's been waiting all month!
But I'm hungry as well, and I've waited longer
